Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at NH Madrid Atocha places you in the heart of Madrid, walking distance from Reina Sofia Museum and CaixaForum Madrid. This hotel is close to Prado Museum and Plaza Mayor.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 68 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of NH Madrid Atocha.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Madrid? This hotel has facilities measuring 312 square feet (29 square meters), including a meeting room.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite from a snack bar/deli serving guests of NH Madrid Atocha.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

A stay at NH Madrid Atocha places you in the heart of Madrid, walking distance from Reina Sofia Museum and CaixaForum Madrid. This hotel is close to Prado Museum and Plaza Mayor.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Reina Sofia Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
CaixaForum Madrid - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Royal Botanical Garden - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Royal Tapestry Factory - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Prado Museum - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
El Retiro Park - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
La Casa Encendida - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Madrid Railway Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Crystal Palace - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Valle-Inclan Theater - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Monumental Theatre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Velazquez Palace - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Congress of Deputies - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Museo Naval - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for NH Madrid Atocha is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 12.2 km / 7.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
